The '''MINECON 2015 Cape''' is a [[cape]] given to [[MINECON 2015]] attendees.

== Distribution ==

=== {{JE|nl=1}} ===
{{IN|JE}}, this cape was given to [[MINECON 2015]] attendees who redeemed an emailed link, provided they have scanned their ticket at the venue.<ref>{{citation|url=https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/872983-minecon-capes|title=Mojang &vert; MINECON Capes|website=help.mojang.com|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190924120713/https://help.mojang.com/customer/portal/articles/872983-minecon-capes}}</ref>

=== {{BE|nl=1}} ===
{{main|Minecon 2015 Skin Pack|MINECON 2016 Skin Pack}}

{{IN|BE}}, this cape was available in [[skin pack]]s. These skin packs featured Steve and Alex skins with all of the MINECON capes. These capes are locked to the skin pack and cannot be equipped with other skins, so they are not considered to be fully available on this edition.

From July 1, 2015 to July 15, 2015, the MINECON 2015 Cape was available for free with the [[Minecon 2015 Skin Pack]] {{in|LCE}}. On September 12, 2017, the Minecon 2015 Skin Pack was made available {{in|BE}} for players who previously owned it in Legacy Console Edition.<ref>{{Cite|url=https://mojang.com/2015/06/littlebigplanet-meets-minecraft-minecon-capes/|title=LittleBigPlanet meets Minecraft! Minecon capes!|website=mojang.com|author=Owen|date=June 30, 2015|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20171115175446/https://mojang.com/2015/06/littlebigplanet-meets-minecraft-minecon-capes/}}</ref><ref>{{mcnet|new-marketplace-space-sports-and-dinosaurs|New on Marketplace: Space, Sports and Dinosaurs|21 September, 2017|Tom Stone}}</ref>

From September 23, 2016 to October 3, 2016 {{in|LCE}} and from September 22, 2016 to October 7, 2016 {{in|BE}}, the MINECON 2015 Cape was available for free with the [[MINECON 2016 Skin Pack]].<ref>{{citation|url=http://mojang.com/2016/09/minecon-2016-skins-incoming-get-em-while-theyre-hot/|title=MINECON 2016 skins incoming! Get ‘em while they’re hot!|website=mojang.com|author=Marsh Davies|date=September 22, 2016|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20161001081335/http://mojang.com/2016/09/minecon-2016-skins-incoming-get-em-while-theyre-hot/}}</ref>

== Xbox 360 Edition avatar item ==
{{main|Xbox 360 Edition/Avatar items}}

On July 1, 2015,<ref>{{citation|url=https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-us/Product/Minecraft-Xbox-360-Edition/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802584111f7?downloadtype=AvatarItem&pagesize=90&Page=1|title=Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition|website=marketplace.xbox.com|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240515022828mp_/https://marketplace.xbox.com/en-us/Product/Minecraft-Xbox-360-Edition/66acd000-77fe-1000-9115-d802584111f7?downloadtype=AvatarItem&pagesize=90&Page=1}}</ref> the cape was put on the Xbox 360 Marketplace as a downloadable avatar prop costing {{price|1.00}}.<ref>{{citation|url=https://marketplace.xbox.com/En-us/Product/Minecon-2015-Cape/00001000-b1a9-12b3-c326-306b584111f7|title=Minecon 2015 Cape|website=marketplace.xbox.com|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20240619115815/https://marketplace.xbox.com/En-us/Product/Minecon-2015-Cape/00001000-b1a9-12b3-c326-306b584111f7}}</ref> On July 29, 2024, the Xbox 360 Marketplace closed, making this item unavailable unless it was purchased before the closure.<ref>{{citation|url=https://support.xbox.com/en-US/help/xbox-360/store/xbox-360-marketplace-update|title=Xbox 360 Store and Xbox 360 Marketplace FAQ|website=support.xbox.com}}</ref>
